description.ko: 거대한 고층 빌딩과 화려한 네온 광고가 잠들지 않는 미래의 스카이라인을 장식하는 첨단 도시의 풍경입니다.
description.en: A high-tech urban landscape where towering skyscrapers and glowing advertisements define the skyline of a restless future.

prompt: A sprawling cyberpunk cityscape at night, vibrant neon signs in electric blue, magenta, and acid green, towering futuristic skyscrapers, flying vehicles leaving light trails, rain-slicked streets reflecting the city lights, hyper-realistic textures, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, synthwave aesthetic, high-tech urban environment.
